front.title: RBridges: OAM and BFD Support for TRILL

abstract.t: This document specifies a general channel for sending OAM(Operations, Administration, and Maintenance) messages betweenRBridges in a campus through an extension to the TRILL (TransparentInterconnection of Lots of Links) protocol. It further specifies useof this channel for the BFD (Bidirectional Forwarding Detection)protocol.
